questions.questionText: How does IOTA determine the voting power of a validator in its Delegated-Proof-of-Stake (DPoS) system?

answerOptions.answerText: The number of transactions processed by the validator.
The amount of stake delegated to them by IOTA token holders.

questions.questionText: What happens when you unstake your IOTA tokens?

answerOptions.answerText: The stake object is unwrapped, and both the principal and accumulated rewards are returned as IOTA tokens.
The validator retains the commission rate in the next epoch.
Your tokens are automatically staked with another validator.

questions.questionText: What is a validator commission rate?

answerOptions.answerText: The rate at which a validator processes transactions.
The percentage of staking rewards a validator takes from stakers.
The maximum rewards a validator can earn.
The minimum stake required by a validator.
